scripts.build: rm -rf build && parallelshell 'npm run build:js' 'npm run build:style'
scripts.build:style: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map build/james.css.map style/main.scss build/james.css && autoprefixer build/james.css && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: rm -rf build/fonts && mkdir -p build/fonts && cp ./node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* build/fonts/ && cp -r ./resource/* ./build/
scripts.package: npm run build && rm -rf ./package &&  mkdir -p ./package && mkdir -p ./binaries && browserify --node -e build/index.js -o ./package/index.js --exclude remote && npm run -s copy-files-package && npm run -s create-binaries
scripts.zip-binaries: cd binaries; for i in *; do zip -r "${i%/}.zip" "$i"; done
scripts.copy-files-package: rm -rf package/fonts && mkdir -p package/fonts && cp ./node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* package/fonts/ && cp -r ./resource/* ./package/ && cp ./build/james.css ./package
